author: Shannon Flanagan-Watson
text:
Does your jurisdiction have an administrative policy for retirement parties for employees who are retiring after a certain number of years which might include parameters around retirement gifts? If so, could you please share a copy of it? Many thanks in advance. 
Shannon Flanagan-Watson
Assistant County Manager
Arlington County, VA
sflanagan-watson@arlingtonva.us
(703) 228-3911
title: Retirement party policy
